name: aikyo - A backend framework for creating interconnected AI characters
description: aikyo is a backend framework for creating interconnected AI characters. It enables the easy construction of networks where independent characters can connect with each other and engage in natural conversational exchanges. In addition, systems called Action and Knowledge allow for autonomous character control using large language models (LLMs).
